entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 9.4Â°C

Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 9:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local smoke early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies late in the afternoon. Local smoke late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies early in the evening. Local smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
